snippet: Major League Baseball’s lawyers issued subpoenas to Federal Express, AT&T Mobility and T-Mobile USA as it investigated players suspected of using performance-enhancing drugs.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Major League Baseball’s lawyers issue subpoenas to Federal Express, AT&T Mobility and T-Mobile USA as it investigates players suspected of using performance-enhancing drugs; baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball’s lawyers issued subpoenas to Federal Express, AT&T Mobility and T-Mobile USA as it investigated players suspected of using performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.seo: Major League Baseball Subpoenas Shipper and Cellphone Companies
headline.main: Baseball Seeks Records in Florida Doping Case
headline.print_headline: Baseball Seeks Records In Florida Doping Case
